# π

> The mathematical constant [π][pi].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var PI = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-pi' );
```

#### PI

The mathematical constant [π][pi].

``` javascript
PI === 3.141592653589793;
```

<!-- </usage> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var PI = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-pi' );

console.log( PI );
// => 3.141592653589793
```
